metadata.title: CVE-2022-0865 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Reachable Assertion in tiffcp in libtiff 4.3.0 allows attackers to cause adenial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtifffrom sources, the fix is available with commit 5e180045.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0865` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.5
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.5
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.5
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5ubuntu0.5').
